attributes.action: demand of the Faroe Island and Danish governments that the senseless slaughter of dolphins on the Faroe Islands must be stopped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Calderon Dolphins are an endangered species and a beautiful mammal which is being slaughtered needlessly in the name of 'manhood initiation' and for no other (economic, for example) reason

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Danish government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
